verbs.description: The world [V: may] be alarmed with Trump 's declaration of Jerusalem as Israel 's capital , but it fits neatly into his domestic political calculus . Evangelicals make up a key part of Trump 's base , and he views " promise keeping " and making history as supreme virtues , especially when elite opinion says no .
